arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
translation: Allah brings the creation into being, then He will repeat it[5], then to Him you will be returned.
footnotes: [5] Common sense testifies that He Who originates creation can reproduce it far more easily.
